title: Plan: Tactile-Win - Keyboard-driven window tiler for Windows
description:
## Overview
A Rust implementation of GNOME Tactile for Windows. Provides keyboard-centric window tiling where users press a hotkey (Win+T), see a grid overlay with key labels (QWER/ASDF), and press two keys to tile the active window to the combined region.

## Technical Approach
- Pure Rust with windows-rs crate for Win32 APIs
- Single binary, no runtime dependencies
- Layered transparent overlay window for grid display
- Global hotkey registration for activation
- Multi-monitor support via MonitorFromWindow

## Key Features
- 4x2 grid mapped to QWER (top) and ASDF (bottom)
- Two-key selection: first key = anchor, second key = extent
- Configurable gap sizes between tiles
- Works with multiple monitors
- Escape to cancel

## Reference
Based on GNOME Tactile: https://gitlab.com/lundal/tactile

title: Plan: Tactile-Win - Keyboard-driven window tiler for Windows
description: Rust implementation of GNOME Tactile for Windows. Keyboard-centric window tiling: Win+T shows grid (QWER/ASDF), press two keys to tile window to combined region.

title: Initialize Cargo project with windows-rs dependencies
description: Create Cargo.toml with windows crate (Win32_Foundation, Win32_UI_WindowsAndMessaging, Win32_Graphics_Gdi, Win32_System_LibraryLoader, Win32_UI_Input_KeyboardAndMouse). Set up basic main.rs with message loop skeleton.

title: Implement Win32 message loop and window class registration
description: Create hidden message-only window. Register window class, CreateWindowExW, GetMessage/TranslateMessage/DispatchMessage loop.

title: Implement grid geometry module with key-to-tile mapping
description: Grid struct with cols/rows/gap. Map Q-R to row 0, A-F to row 1. tile_rect(key) and combine_tiles(k1,k2) functions.

title: Get foreground window and monitor work area
description: GetForegroundWindow(), MonitorFromWindow(), GetMonitorInfoW() for work area excluding taskbar.

title: Register global Win+T hotkey with RegisterHotKey
description: RegisterHotKey(hwnd, id, MOD_WIN, VK_T). Handle WM_HOTKEY to trigger overlay. Unregister on exit.

title: Create transparent overlay window for grid display
Render grid tiles with key labels using GDI
description: WM_PAINT draws semi-transparent tiles with centered labels. Highlight selected tile after first keypress.

title: Capture keyboard input in overlay modal state
description: Low-level keyboard hook (WH_KEYBOARD_LL) when overlay visible. Track first/second key. Escape cancels.

title: Implement two-key tile selection logic
description: First key = anchor + highlight. Second key = compute combined rect. Same key twice = single tile.

title: Move and resize target window with SetWindowPos
description: Hide overlay, SetWindowPos(hwnd, x, y, w, h). Restore maximized windows first. Apply gap offsets.

title: Add multi-monitor support with monitor switching
description: Tab/arrows to switch monitors. Show overlay on active window's monitor. Per-monitor work areas.

title: Add configuration file support
description: Load from ~/.tactile-win.toml. Settings: grid dims, gap size, hotkey, colors. serde+toml crate.
